title: spec: BuiltinCall section contradicts itself
body:
http://tip.golang.org/ref/spec#Built-in_functions contains:

    BuiltinCall = identifier "(" [ BuiltinArgs [ "," ] ] ")" .
    BuiltinArgs = Type [ "," ExpressionList ] | ExpressionList .

http://tip.golang.org/ref/spec#Appending_and_copying_slices contains this example:

    s3 := append(s2, s0...)

â€¦but BuiltinArgs doesn't allow a trailing '...' like the regular Call suffix on a
PrimaryExpr does.
